name: Deconstructed Trench Coat
description: An oversized, floor-length trench coat in washed black canvas. Features raw, unfinished hems, a fragmented back panel, and an integrated leather harness system.

name: Wraparound Shield Sunglasses
description: Aggressive, futuristic shield sunglasses with a monolithic lens. Engraved with a cryptic serial number on the temple. Total light absorption.

name: Crucifix Hardware Loafers
description: Polished black leather loafers built on a heavy-duty lug sole. Adorned with a custom sterling silver crucifix across the vamp. The uniform for the new church.

name: Studded Fingerless Gauntlets
description: Soft grain leather fingerless gloves extending to the mid-forearm. Lined with polished steel studs and an adjustable wrist strap. Second skin for the concrete jungle.

name: Voidwood No. 03
description: A deeply unsettling fragrance. Top notes of petrichor and cold iron give way to a heart of smoked oud and a base of damp earth. The scent of a forgotten place.

name: Sigil Graphic Tee
description: Heavyweight oversized tee in sun-faded black. Features a large, cracked-ink sigil graphic on the back with minimal branding on the chest. A uniform for the initiated.

name: Single Dagger Drop Earring
description: A single, razor-sharp dagger earring cast in solid .925 sterling silver. Hangs from a small, secure hoop. Sold individually.
